title: Men of Numenor (5C37)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Wound a minion bearing a [Gondor] fortification.
Lore:	”'…I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory….'”
Rarity:	C
